content: The publication failed with the following error. When I open /var/log/zulip/install.log, the display file is empty.2019-01-02-下午10.14.24.png，But when I released it five days ago, there was no problem.
@mir_lv can you explain how you were doing the installation?
I've never seen an error like that before.

The specific method is my colleague, but he is leaving now! I only know that it is through docker. It can be installed normally a few days ago. Now the installation fails. I switched to the version a few days ago and the installation failed. I guess it should be a ubuntu environment problem. What do you think?
I just got another error through the installation of another server, indicating that it is not an environmental problem.
If you're building your own Docker image with modified code, it's not really something we can support. The Docker image builds consistently for me.
